wikipedia_page.main: Paul Laurence Lloyd (born 26 March 1987) is an English football midfielder who plays for Bamber Bridge.

response: The 2009 Conference League Cup Final took place on 9 April 2009 and was contested by Forest Green Rovers and AFC Telford United at The New Lawn, the home of Forest Green. Rovers had the best of the game but they lacked a cutting edge to see off Telford and ultimately they went on to lose in a penalty shoot-out. Telford goalkeeper Ryan Young saved penalties from Andy Mangan, Conal Platt, and Paul Lloyd, whilst Jon Adams, Mark Danks, and Gavin Cowan were all successful from the spot for United.
* PJ Black (Phillip Paul Lloyd, born 1981), South African professional wrestler
